turn-on-cam-message: Please turn on your webcam here under.
waiting-participant: Please wait while your contact is about to join you.
participant-cam-off: Your contact has joined the video call but has webcam turned off.
participant-left: Your contact has left the call.

dialog.title: Permissions
dialog.description: To ensure that video call work, we need the following permissions:

camera.granted: The camera permission has been granted.
camera.denied: The camera permission has been denied.
camera.waiting: We need the camera permission to make the video call work.

microphone.granted: The microphone permission has been granted.
microphone.denied: The microphone permission has been denied.
microphone.waiting: We need the microphone permission to make the video call work.
